channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-3247] Kafka Connector unusable with quickstarts - shading issue
item.description:
The Kafka Connector now requires Curator, which is referenced as flink-shaded-curator. The quickstarts make sure it is not packaged into the jar file via exclusions.

The curator classes are however only in relocated form in the flink-dist.jar - relocated manually in the flink-runtime project. The connector can thus not use find the Curator classes and fails.
item.summary: Kafka Connector unusable with quickstarts - shading issue

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
I can not reproduce the issue.
Also, the * does not seem to work properly:

[INFO] --- maven-shade-plugin:2.4.1:shade (default) @ debug-1.0-2.11 ---

The * exclude worked for me, using Maven 3.0.4 and was the culprit.

Probably difference in behavior between Maven versions.

We should change this to not use star excludes at all.

I'm not sure, even with Maven 3.0.4, maven will include curator into the fat jar .. so I can not reproduce the issue.
